<WG3752> And When <WG1161> Ye Shall Hear Of <WG191> Wars <WG4171> And <WG2532> <WG181> Commotions, <WG3361> Be Not Terrified; <WG4422> Must <WG1163> For <WG1063> These Things <WG5023> Take Place <WG1096> First, <WG4412> ' But <WG235> Not <WG3756> Immediately Is <WG2112> The <WG3588> End. <WG5056>
Then <WG5119> He Was Saying <WG3004> To Them, <WG846> Shall Rise Up <WG1453> Nation <WG1484> Against <WG1909> Nation, <WG1484> And <WG2532> Kingdom <WG932> Against <WG1909> Kingdom; <WG932>

<WG576> But It Shall Turn Out <WG1161> To You <WG5213> For <WG1519> A Testimony. <WG3142>
Settle <WG5087> Therefore <WG3767> In <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG2588> Your Hearts <WG5216> Not <WG3361> To Premeditate <WG4304> To Make A Defence; <WG626>

<WG1473> For I 1063 CONJ Will Give 1325 V-FAI-1S You 5213 P-2DP A Mouth 4750 N-ASN And 2532 CONJ Wisdom, 4678 N-ASF Which 3739 R-DSF 3756 PRT-N Shall Not Be Able 1410 V-FDI-3P To Reply To 471 V-2AAN Nor 3761 ADV To Resist 436 V-2AAN All 3956 A-NPM Those 3588 T-NPM Opposing 480 V-PNP-NPM You. 5213 P-2DP

<WG3860> But Ye Will Be Delivered Up <WG1161> Even <WG2532> By <WG5259> Parents <WG1118> And <WG2532> Brethren <WG80> And <WG2532> Relations <WG4773> And <WG2532> Friends, <WG5384> And <WG2532> They Will Put To Death Some <WG2289> From Among <WG1537> You, <WG5216>

And <WG2532> A Hair <WG2359> Of <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG2776> Your Head <WG5216> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> May Perish. <WG622>
By <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG5281> Your Patient Endurance <WG5216> Gain <WG2932> <WG3588> <WG5590> Your Souls. <WG5216>

<WG3752> But When <WG1161> Ye See <WG1492> Being Encircled <WG2944> With <WG5259> Armies <WG4760> <WG3588> Jerusalem <WG2419> Then <WG5119> Know <WG1097> That <WG3754> Has Drawn Near <WG1448> <WG3588> <WG2050> Her Desolation. <WG846>

For <WG3754> Days <WG2250> Of Avenging <WG1557> These <WG3778> Are, <WG1526> <WG3588> That May Be Accomplished <WG4137> All Things <WG3956> That <WG3588> Have Been Written. <WG1125>

<WG3759> But Woe <WG1161> <WG3588> To Those <WG1722> <WG1064> With Child <WG2192> And <WG2532> To Those <WG3588> Giving Suck <WG2337> In <WG1722> Those <WG1565> <WG3588> Days, <WG2250> <WG2071> For There Shall Be <WG1063> Distress <WG318> Great <WG3173> Upon <WG1909> The <WG3588> Land <WG1093> And <WG2532> Wrath <WG3709> Among <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2992> This People. <WG5129>

When <WG3752> They Sprout <WG4261> Already, <WG2235> Looking On Them <WG991> ' Of <WG575> Yourselves <WG1438> Ye Know <WG1097> That <WG3754> Already <WG2235> Near <WG1451> The <WG3588> Summer <WG2330> Is. <WG2076>

So <WG3779> Also <WG2532> Ye, <WG5210> When <WG3752> Ye See <WG1492> These Things <WG5023> Coming To Pass <WG1096> Know <WG1097> That <WG3754> Near <WG1451> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Kingdom <WG932> <WG3588> Of God. <WG2316>

The <WG3588> Heaven <WG3772> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Earth <WG1093> <WG3928> <WG3588> Shall Pass Away, <WG1161> <WG3056> But My Words <WG3450> <WG3756> In No Wise <WG3361> May Pass Away. <WG3928>

<WG4337> But Take Heed <WG1161> To Yourselves, <WG1438> Lest <WG3379> Be Laden <WG925> Your <WG5216> <WG3588> Hearts <WG2588> With <WG1722> Surfeiting <WG2897> And <WG2532> Drinking <WG3178> And <WG2532> Cares <WG3308> Of Life, <WG982> And <WG2532> Suddenly <WG160> ' Upon <WG1909> You <WG5209> Should Come <WG2186> <WG3588> <WG2250> That Day; <WG1565>

<WG5613> <WG3803> For As A Snare <WG1063> Shall It Come <WG1904> Upon <WG1909> All <WG3956> Those <WG3588> Sitting <WG2521> Upon <WG1909> The Face <WG4383> Of All <WG3956> The <WG3588> Earth. <WG1093>

Watch <WG69> Therefore <WG3767> At <WG1722> Every <WG3956> Season <WG2540> Praying, <WG1189> That <WG2443> Ye May Be Accounted Worthy <WG2661> To Escape <WG1628> These Things <WG5023> All <WG3956> Which <WG3588> Are About <WG3195> To Come To Pass, <WG1096> And <WG2532> To Stand <WG2476> Before <WG1715> The <WG3588> Son <WG5207> <WG3588> Of Man. <WG444>
